turns.content: Write the lyrics to a song that is the opening theme for a podcast called The Judd Buds which is a podcast about the music group The Judds.

(Verse 1)
Gather 'round, y'all, we're gonna talk,
About a duo that made country rock,
Two hearts, one soul, singing their truth,
Naomi and Wynonna, a love we can't refuse.

(Chorus)
The Judd Buds, we're here to stay,
Talkin' 'bout the Judds, in every way,
Love can build a bridge, they taught us so,
The Judd Buds podcast, welcome to the show.

(Verse 2)
From Kentucky hills to the stage they soared,
A mother-daughter bond that could never be ignored,
Through hardships and triumphs, they held on tight,
The Judds' music shines like a beacon in the night.

(Chorus)
The Judd Buds, we're here to stay,
Talkin' 'bout the Judds, in every way,
Love can build a bridge, they taught us so,
The Judd Buds podcast, welcome to the show.

(Bridge)
With laughter and tears, we'll share their tale,
The Judd Buds podcast, we'll never fail,
Exploring the journey that made them stars,
The Judds, forever, in our hearts.

(Verse 3)
Naomi's wisdom and Wynonna's voice,
Two amazing women, one incredible choice,
To share their love, their passion, and pain,
In the world of country, they'll always reign.

(Chorus)
The Judd Buds, we're here to stay,
Talkin' 'bout the Judds, in every way,
Love can build a bridge, they taught us so,
The Judd Buds podcast, welcome to the show.

(Outro)
So come along, friends, let's celebrate,
The Judd Buds podcast, it's gonna be great,
We'll dive into the stories and the songs they made,
The Judd Buds, together, on this Judd parade.
